Calling all Technical Recruiters, Technical Business Development Managers, and Accounting and Finance Recruiting Managers. Hi.... I need you. Like, today :)! Send me a message or email me at agruner@VincentBenjamin.com

Calling all high energy, IT recruiters, Business Development and Recruiting Managers to join our talented team here in Phoenix. If you think you are at all interested in any of these positions, please feel free to send me a message. Lets get connected!
Division Director, Strategic Account Pursuit Team

Founded in 1948, Robert Half pioneered the concept of professional staffing services. As a top staffing agency, Robert Half once again was named to FORTUNE® magazine's list of "World's Most Admired Companies" and was the highest-ranked staffing firm. (March 1, 2016) The company is traded on the New York Stock Exchange (symbol: RHI) and is a member of the S&P 500 index. For 2015, Robert Half reported revenues of $5.09 billion versus $7 million in 1986. Robert Half, an Equal Opportunity Employer, currently has staffing and consulting operations in more than 400 locations.As it has grown, the staffing agency has kept its specialized approach — each of its seven professional staffing divisions has a separate focus and separate employee teams. Robert Half has seven professional staffing services: Accountemps®, Robert Half® Finance & Accounting and Robert Half® Management Resources, for temporary, full-time and senior-level project professionals, respectively, in the fields of accounting and finance; OfficeTeam®, for highly skilled office and administrative support professionals; Robert Half® Technology, for information technology professionals; Robert Half® Legal, for temporary, project and full-time staffing of attorneys, paralegals and legal support personnel; and The Creative Group®, for interactive, design, marketing, advertising and public relations professionals.Robert Half also is the parent company of Protiviti, a global business consulting firm that helps companies solve problems in finance, technology, operations, governance, risk and internal audit. The company and its independently owned member firms serve clients through a network of more than 70 locations in 20 countries. Protiviti helps businesses seize new opportunities for growth and profitability while protecting them from their risks.

The Creative Group (TCG) is a leader among marketing and creative staffing agencies. We specialize in connecting talented, creative professionals with companies looking to hire interactive, design, marketing, advertising and public relations talent. As the marketing and creative staffing division of Robert Half, we offer flexible staffing solutions to meet companies' project, contract-to-hire and full-time employment needs. Through our parent company, we also have the resources to support organizations' temporary and full-time staffing needs in the areas of technology, accounting, finance, administrative and legal.TCG is a creative and design staffing agency that is well-connected to the communities we serve. We have built valuable relationships with the top industry organizations, including AIGA, HOW Magazine, Graphic Design USA and The American Advertising Federation (AAF). We also have an exclusive relationship with The Wall Street Journal. For this reason, working with The Creative Group gives companies and individual professionals a unique advantage over other creative and marketing staffing agencies.Ashlyn.gruner@creativegroup.com602.794.9794creativegroup.com

Outsource is the largest staffing firm exclusive to the wiring industry. With 15 offices across the major markets in the US, the Cabling Recruiter is required to find qualified candidates for San Diego's low voltage accounts'. As the San Diego branch Cable and Electrical Recruiter, responsibilities include:- Daily management of technicians and correspondence with clients.- Utilize internal database in conjunction with online job boards and local resources to optimize candidate searching and screening abilities.- Interview and screen multiple candidates weekly for short term and long term opportunities prior to submitting candidates to clients.- Generate leads for business development.- Coordinate paperwork and scheduling of technicians.As the low voltage Recruiter, I orchestrate 40+ specialized technicians on multiple construction sites to ensure they attain a 40 hour work week, while generating $45K+ in weekly revenue for the company. The ultimate goal is to satisfy the labor requirements of our clients with quality and skilled tradesman in a safe development environment while turning the highest margin possible on revenue.
